## üîÑ Type of Change
Please check all that apply:

### Code Changes
- [ ] **Bug fix** - Non-breaking change which fixes an issue
- [ ] **New feature** - Non-breaking change which adds functionality
- [ ] **Breaking change** - Fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to change
- [ ] **Refactoring** - No functional changes, improves code structure
- [ ] **Performance** - Improves performance or memory usage
- [ ] **Security** - Addresses security vulnerability or improves security

### Other Changes
- [ ] **Documentation update** - Improves or adds documentation
- [ ] **Build system** - Changes to build process or configuration
- [ ] **Code style** - Formatting, linting, or code organization
- [ ] **CI/CD** - Changes to continuous integration or deployment
- [ ] **Dependencies** - Adds, updates, or removes dependencies
- [ ] **Other** - Please describe:
